code: import axios from"axios";import{useState}from"react";import API_BASE_URL from"../config";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PaymentUpload(_ref){let{bookingId}=_ref;const[image,setImage]=useState(null);function upload(){if(!image)return alert("Upload Screenshot");const fd=new FormData();fd.append("payment",image);axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/upload-payment/").concat(bookingId),fd,{headers:{"Content-Type":"multipart/form-data"}}).then(()=>{alert("Payment Uploaded, Waiting for Admin Approval");window.location="/bookings";});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card p-3 mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Upload Payment Screenshot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",className:"form-control mt-2",onChange:e=>setImage(e.target.files[0])}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-warning mt-2",onClick:upload,children:"Submit Payment"})]});}
